title: Plinko Board of Learner Friction
description: Interactive simulation illustrating the GED strategy concept: high-volume intake meets a plinko board of exit friction. A learner (ball) drops through pegs labeled with friction points (family life, life disruption, learning disabilities, subject difficulty, self doubt, performance discouragement) and lands in one of five outcome slots (Never tested, Partially tested, Credentialed).
